definition[0]: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something
example[0]: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
example[1]: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
definition[1]: if someone is overcome by smoke or gas, they become extremely sick or unconscious because they breathe it
example[2]: The engineer was working on the freezer when he was overcome by gas.
explanation[0]: Overcome is usually passive in this meaning
definition[2]: if someone is overcome by emotion, they cannot behave normally because they feel the emotion so strongly
definition[3]: to fight and win against someone or something
